member.name: T:Holoville.HO2DToolkit.HOtk2dButton
member.summary: Attach this component to a sprite to use it as a button.

member.name: M:Holoville.HO2DToolkit.HOtk2dButton.ToggleOn(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Selects this button (only if it's a toggle button)
member.param: If TRUE dispatches relative events, otherwise ignores them

member.name: M:Holoville.HO2DToolkit.HOtk2dButton.ToggleOff(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Deselects this button (only if it's a toggle button)
member.param: If TRUE dispatches relative events, otherwise ignores them

member.name: P:Holoville.HO2DToolkit.HOtk2dButton.selected
member.summary: Returns TRUE if this button is a toggle and is actually selected

member.name: T:Holoville.HO2DToolkit.IHOtk2dSprite
member.summary: Interface to add to the tk2dBaseSprite class in order to use the HO2DToolkit library.

member.name: M:Holoville.HO2DToolkit.IHOtk2dSprite.SetSprite(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the sprite to the one with the given name, or returns FALSE if none corresponds

member.name: M:Holoville.HO2DToolkit.IHOtk2dSprite.GetSpriteName
member.summary: Returns the name of the sprite in the collection (add this method to tk2dBaseSprite)

member.name: T:Holoville.HO2DToolkit.HOtk2dGUIManager
member.summary: Manager for HO2DToolkit GUI elements, automatically added at runtime when needed.

member.name: P:Holoville.HO2DToolkit.HOtk2dGUIManager.defaultGuiCamera
member.summary: Camera that will be used for all new buttons that don't have a camera set. Default to Camera.main if not set.

member.name: T:Holoville.HO2DToolkit.IHOtk2dTextMesh
member.summary: Interface to add to the tk2dTextMesh class in order to use the HO2DToolkit library.

member.name: M:Holoville.HO2DToolkit.IHOtk2dTextMesh.Commit
member.summary: Commits the changes to the text

member.name: M:Holoville.HO2DToolkit.IHOtk2dTextMesh.GetMeshDimensionsForString(System.String)
member.summary: Returns the mesh dimension for the given string

member.name: F:Holoville.HO2DToolkit.HOtk2dButtonEventType.Toggle
member.summary: A toggle button is toggled (selected or deselected)

member.name: F:Holoville.HO2DToolkit.HOtk2dButtonEventType.Press
member.summary: The mouse was pressed over the button

member.name: F:Holoville.HO2DToolkit.HOtk2dButtonEventType.Release
member.summary: The mouse was released inside or outside the button, after the button was pressed

member.name: F:Holoville.HO2DToolkit.HOtk2dButtonEventType.Click
member.summary: The mouse was released inside the same button that was initially pressed

member.name: F:Holoville.HO2DToolkit.HOtk2dButtonEventType.RollOver
member.summary: The mouse rolled over a button which has a rollover animation

member.name: F:Holoville.HO2DToolkit.HOtk2dButtonEventType.RollOut
member.summary: The mouse rolled out of a button which has a rollover animation

member.name: M:Holoville.HO2DToolkit.IHOtk2dSlicedSprite.SetSprite(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the sprite to the one with the given name, or returns FALSE if none corresponds

member.name: M:Holoville.HO2DToolkit.IHOtk2dSlicedSprite.GetSpriteName
member.summary: Returns the name of the sprite in the collection (add this method to tk2dBaseSprite)
